Properties.commandText:
SELECT "e0"."Id", "e0"."Address", "e0"."CurrentWorkplace", "e0"."DateOfBirth", "e0"."FullName", "e0"."Gender", "e0"."JoinDate", "e0"."UserId", "e0"."VacationRemaining", "u"."Id", "u"."Email", "u"."PasswordHash", "u"."Role", "u"."Salt", "s0"."Id", "s0"."EmployeeId", "s0"."Level", "s0"."SkillId", "s0"."Id0", "s0"."Category", "s0"."IconPath", "s0"."Name"
FROM (
    SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."Address", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "e"."DateOfBirth", "e"."FullName", "e"."Gender", "e"."JoinDate", "e"."UserId", "e"."VacationRemaining"
    FROM "Employees" AS "e"
    ORDER BY "e"."Id"
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "e0"
INNER JOIN "Users" AS "u" ON "e0"."UserId" = "u"."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "e1"."Id", "e1"."EmployeeId", "e1"."Level", "e1"."SkillId", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "s"."Category", "s"."IconPath", "s"."Name"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e1"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e1"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s0" ON "e0"."Id" = "s0"."EmployeeId"
ORDER BY "e0"."Id", "u"."Id", "s0"."Id"

MessageTemplate: Executed DbCommand ({elapsed}ms) [Parameters=[{parameters}], CommandType='{commandType}', CommandTimeout='{commandTimeout}']{newLine}{commandText}

Properties.commandText:
SELECT "e0"."Id", "e0"."Address", "e0"."CurrentWorkplace", "e0"."DateOfBirth", "e0"."FullName", "e0"."Gender", "e0"."JoinDate", "e0"."UserId", "e0"."VacationRemaining", "u"."Id", "u"."Email", "u"."PasswordHash", "u"."Role", "u"."Salt", "s0"."Id", "s0"."EmployeeId", "s0"."Level", "s0"."SkillId", "s0"."Id0", "s0"."Category", "s0"."IconPath", "s0"."Name"
FROM (
    SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."Address", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "e"."DateOfBirth", "e"."FullName", "e"."Gender", "e"."JoinDate", "e"."UserId", "e"."VacationRemaining"
    FROM "Employees" AS "e"
    ORDER BY "e"."Id"
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "e0"
INNER JOIN "Users" AS "u" ON "e0"."UserId" = "u"."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "e1"."Id", "e1"."EmployeeId", "e1"."Level", "e1"."SkillId", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "s"."Category", "s"."IconPath", "s"."Name"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e1"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e1"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s0" ON "e0"."Id" = "s0"."EmployeeId"
ORDER BY "e0"."Id", "u"."Id", "s0"."Id"

Properties.commandText:
SELECT "s0"."Id", "s0"."Address", "s0"."CurrentWorkplace", "s0"."DateOfBirth", "s0"."FullName", "s0"."Gender", "s0"."JoinDate", "s0"."UserId", "s0"."VacationRemaining", "s0"."Id0", "s0"."Email", "s0"."PasswordHash", "s0"."Role", "s0"."Salt", "s1"."Id", "s1"."EmployeeId", "s1"."Level", "s1"."SkillId", "s1"."Id0", "s1"."Category", "s1"."IconPath", "s1"."Name"
FROM (
    SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."Address", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "e"."DateOfBirth", "e"."FullName", "e"."Gender", "e"."JoinDate", "e"."UserId", "e"."VacationRemaining", "u"."Id" AS "Id0", "u"."Email", "u"."PasswordHash", "u"."Role", "u"."Salt"
    FROM "Employees" AS "e"
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS "u" ON "e"."UserId" = "u"."Id"
    WHERE "e"."Id" = @__id_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS "s0"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "e0"."Id", "e0"."EmployeeId", "e0"."Level", "e0"."SkillId", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "s"."Category", "s"."IconPath", "s"."Name"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e0"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e0"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s1" ON "s0"."Id" = "s1"."EmployeeId"
ORDER BY "s0"."Id", "s0"."Id0", "s1"."Id"

Properties.commandText:
SELECT "s0"."Id", "s0"."Address", "s0"."CurrentWorkplace", "s0"."DateOfBirth", "s0"."FullName", "s0"."Gender", "s0"."JoinDate", "s0"."UserId", "s0"."VacationRemaining", "s0"."Id0", "s0"."Email", "s0"."PasswordHash", "s0"."Role", "s0"."Salt", "s1"."Id", "s1"."EmployeeId", "s1"."Level", "s1"."SkillId", "s1"."Id0", "s1"."Category", "s1"."IconPath", "s1"."Name"
FROM (
    SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."Address", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "e"."DateOfBirth", "e"."FullName", "e"."Gender", "e"."JoinDate", "e"."UserId", "e"."VacationRemaining", "u"."Id" AS "Id0", "u"."Email", "u"."PasswordHash", "u"."Role", "u"."Salt"
    FROM "Employees" AS "e"
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS "u" ON "e"."UserId" = "u"."Id"
    WHERE "e"."Id" = @__id_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS "s0"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "e0"."Id", "e0"."EmployeeId", "e0"."Level", "e0"."SkillId", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "s"."Category", "s"."IconPath", "s"."Name"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e0"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e0"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s1" ON "s0"."Id" = "s1"."EmployeeId"
ORDER BY "s0"."Id", "s0"."Id0", "s1"."Id"

SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."Address", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "e"."DateOfBirth", "e"."FullName", "e"."Gender", "e"."JoinDate", "e"."UserId", "e"."VacationRemaining", "u"."Id", "u"."Email", "u"."PasswordHash", "u"."Role", "u"."Salt"
FROM "Employees" AS "e"
INNER JOIN "Users" AS "u" ON "e"."UserId" = "u"."Id"
WHERE "e"."Id" = @__userId_0
LIMIT 1
